headline: Kraft Heinz (NasdaqGS:KHC) Commits To FD&C Color-Free Future In U.S. Products
summary: Kraft Heinz (NasdaqGS:KHC) recently announced that it will cease the launch of new U.S. products containing FD&C colors, aiming for complete removal by 2027. This aligns with the company's ongoing focus on nutritional improvements and sustainability. Despite these commitments, the stock experienced a 3% decline last week. In comparison, broader market indices remained generally stable amid global geopolitical tensions and anticipation of the Federal Reserve's interest rate announcement. Thus,...

headline: Kraft Heinz to phase out artificial colours in US portfolio
summary: The Heinz ketchup owner said it has “immediately” stopped launching new US products containing FD&C colours.

headline: General Mills to remove artificial colors from US cereals and foods
summary: The Trix and Lucky Charms maker set a goal to remove synthetic dyes by the end of 2027.
